customerProfile: Michelle has been with the agency since 2021, with a previously stable payment history. Over the past year, she has had fewer service requests and no proactive engagement.
interactionHistory: Her last interaction was in October 2023, regarding a minor auto claim, with no follow-up on policy adjustments.

claimsHistory.description: At-Fault Accident: Fender bender at a stoplight
Water Damage: Pipe burst in kitchen

reasonForRemarket: Her home renewal includes a 30% premium increase, and she has had two late payments in six months. Past notes indicate pricing concerns and potential carrier switching, making her high risk for non-renewal.

customerProfile: Sophia has been with the agency since 2019, with a perfect payment record and multiple policies.
interactionHistory: Last contacted the agency in January 2024 to inquire about adding a new vehicle to her policy.

claimsHistory.description: Not-at-fault collision: Vehicle struck while parked

reasonForRemarket: Lifestyle change - recently purchased a vacation home and looking to bundle all insurance needs with one carrier for maximum discount.

customerProfile: Liam joined the agency in 2020 after relocating for work. He maintains three policies with the agency.
interactionHistory: Regular communication, last contact in February 2024 regarding potential renovations to his property.

claimsHistory.description: Wind damage to roof during storm

reasonForRemarket: Received renewal notice with 25% premium increase due to regional rate adjustments and previous claims history.

customerProfile: Olivia has been a client since 2018, holding both home and auto policies.
interactionHistory: Speaks with the agency quarterly to review coverage needs. Last contacted in March 2024.
reasonForRemarket: Current carrier announced significant rate increases across her region, affecting all policy types.

customerProfile: Noah has been with the agency for over 5 years with multiple policies across different lines.
interactionHistory: Prefers digital communication, primarily uses the client portal for all policy needs.
reasonForRemarket: Planning to downsize home and purchase a vacation property, requiring adjustment to all insurance needs.
